channel.title: feathermode Articles
channel.description: Articles from feathermode on web design, development, marketing, content creation and best practices for businesses and content creators.

item.title: 5 Reasons Why You Need RSS in Your Life
item.description: RSS is a web technology that was created in 1999 and is still the most effective way to consume tailored content on the web today. Let's review 5 reasons why you should have RSS in your life.
